title: Diamond Chandrika Pendant - Exquisite Bridal Charm
features: Features an interwoven teardrop and circular motif, fully encrusted with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The contemporary design evokes traditional South Indian motifs while maintaining a modern aesthetic. The delicate setting ensures maximum light reflection for unparalleled brilliance. The pendant can be worn as Vaddanam/Oddiyanam pendant or can be worn as a short necklace.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to add a touch of modern elegance with a South Indian touch.
description: A stunning fusion of modern design and timeless elegance, this diamond pendant is an investment in enduring beauty. It boasts exceptional craftsmanship, ethical sourcing, and a versatile design that will complement a wide range of outfits. Diamonds add a brilliance that will surely make heads turn. Perfect for gifting.
